TopicTitle: That's no moon... That's a Space Station - Atlas V

Articles.Content:
Ta da! After creating the world's most outrageous craft, the Gaia XXX (as in 30 ) I have gone onto another project, codenamed, Atlas V.

This is essentially a giant space station that orbits Kerbin. Currently, there are 14 brave Kerbals aboard the vessel!

Something interesting, is that I took one of the Kerbals that I landed on Minimus, and literally, used his jetpack to get to the space station. All without the use of the common instruments found on most ships! Including: SAS, Nav-Ball, and the Map-navigator-thing... you know what I'm talking about XD

Anyways, here are the pictures! https://www.dropbox.com/sh/f55pzbo4b2fe4qh/ekqDNky4u5

It comes with:

-An observatory

-Living Quarters

-Communications Station

-Power Station

-Research Facility

-Docking Area

and

-Refuel Depot!!!

I plan to add more as well! Suggestions are always appreciated. This took me a while to make. I think I rendezvoused about 6 times! For a noob like me, that's a lot

Hope you like it!

P.S. Sorry that the version is V0.21, the pictures are old

Edited October 18, 2013 by Elite-Blade 672
Noticed out-dated Pictures
A beautiful station indeed! Lots of functionality, and more power than any station will ever need! I like!

Being totally honest, that isn't really "giant".

Don't worry, you're getting there.
Well... I thought Atlas V was the name of a launch vehicle?
